com.xtructure.xsim.impl
Class AbstractXSimulation<F extends XTime.Phase<F>>

java.lang.Object
  com.xtructure.xutil.id.AbstractXIdObject
      com.xtructure.xsim.impl.AbstractXSimulation<F>
Type Parameters:
F - the type of phase of the time of this simulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
XSimulation<F>, XIdObject, java.lang.Comparable<XIdObject>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractStandardXSimulation, UTestAbstractXSimulation.DummyXSimulation
public abstract class AbstractXSimulation<F extends XTime.Phase<F>>
extends AbstractXIdObject
implements XSimulation<F>

A base XSimulation implementation.

Version:
0.9.6
Author:
Peter Nürnberg, Luis Guimbarda
